sentences.en: All he wanted was a cup of tea and a sit-down.
sentences.cn: 他只求一杯清茶、片刻小憩。

sentences.en: Breakfast consisted of half a cup of milk and a dry biscuit.
sentences.cn: 早餐是半杯牛奶和一片干饼干。

sentences.en: cats were not her cup of tea.
sentences.cn: 猫不是她的所爱。

sentences.en: David knelt, cupped his hands and splashed river water on to his face.
sentences.cn: 大卫跪下去，双手成杯状，捧起河水泼到他的脸上。

sentences.en: He cupped his hands around his mouth and called out for Diane.
sentences.cn: 他两手窝成杯状围在嘴边，大声地呼唤黛安。

sentences.en: I drank a cup of tea that tasted of diesel.
sentences.cn: 我喝了杯有股柴油味的茶。

sentences.en: In a warm-up game for the World Cup, Uruguay have beaten England.
sentences.cn: 在世界杯热身赛中，乌拉圭队打败了英格兰队。

sentences.en: Isabelle placed a wine cup on the table within his reach.
sentences.cn: 伊莎贝尔把酒杯放在桌上他伸手可及的地方。

sentences.en: Mathew picked up the cup and sipped his coffee.
sentences.cn: 马修拿起杯子抿了口咖啡。

sentences.en: Opera is not my cup of tea.
sentences.cn: 戏剧不是我的爱好

sentences.en: Recreational sport is relaxing. Professional sport is another cup of tea altogether.
sentences.cn: 娱乐运动使人放松。专业运动需要认真对待

sentences.en: Refilling his cup, she slopped some tea into the saucer.
sentences.cn: 给他续茶的时候，她不小心溅了一些在茶碟上。

sentences.en: Robinson was sent to Italy to cover the 1990 World Cup.
sentences.cn: 鲁宾逊被派到意大利报道1990年的世界杯比赛。

sentences.en: Roland Nilsson last night backed Sheffield Wednesday to win the UEFA Cup.
sentences.cn: 昨晚罗兰·尼尔森打赌谢菲尔德周三队会捧得欧洲联盟杯。

sentences.en: She put a cup of tea down on the bedside table.
sentences.cn: 她在床头柜上放了一杯茶。

sentences.en: She put her cup and saucer down on the table.
sentences.cn: 她把杯碟放到桌上。

sentences.en: That cup is priceless. You can't put a value on it.
sentences.cn: 那个杯子价值连城，无法定价。

sentences.en: The Belgian Cup has been won by the favourites F.C. Liege.
sentences.cn: 比利时杯被夺冠热门列日队夺得。

sentences.en: The first round of the cup was decided over two legs.
sentences.cn: 杯赛的首轮以两场分胜负。

sentences.en: The Martell Cup Chase was won by the evens favourite Toby Tobias.
sentences.cn: 最被同额赌注赌家看好的托比·托拜厄斯赢得了马特尔杯追逐赛。

sentences.en: The president of the club came to present the cup to the winners.
sentences.cn: 俱乐部主席来给获胜者颁发奖杯。

sentences.en: The team has fought its way to the cup final.
sentences.cn: 这支队伍一路拼杀闯进了杯赛的决赛。

sentences.en: We are selling the full range of World Cup merchandising.
sentences.cn: 我们出售世界杯的所有纪念商品。

sentences.en: We could all do with a cup of tea.
sentences.cn: 要是能给我们都来杯茶就好了。

words.tran_cn: 用吸器放血者，用杯吸法者
用杯盛；使成杯状（cup的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 一杯咖啡的时间；短暂逗留
判断的事件，处理的事件：需要进行推断或处理的事情
n. 戴维斯杯（国际网球赛）
茶杯，转转茶壶；供应茶杯

trans.tran_cn: 杯子，杯状物，一杯（的量），奖杯，〈比赛〉…杯
trans.tran_en: a small round container, usually with a handle, that you use to drink tea, coffee etc

trans.tran_cn: 使（手）窝成杯状，手成盘状托起
trans.tran_en: If you cup your hands, you make them into a curved shape like a cup
